title: Secure Computing
description: We contribute to secure-by-design post-quantum systems, focusing on both theoretical foundations and practical deployability. We design cryptographic implementations and cryptanalysis techniques for post-quantum primitives.

title: Quantum Stack
description: We develop full-stack quantum computing solutions, designing novel quantum algorithms and fault-tolerant software pipelines. Our focus extends to integrating quantum computation with high-performance computing (HPC) platforms.

title: Research Collaboration
description: We partner with universities and industry to write proposals, publish papers, and build new technologies. Our technical depth and academic pedigree set us apart in the rapidly evolving fields of quantum computing and post-quantum cryptography.
